title: Healthy New Jersey
description: A dashboard displaying vaccination status of residents and staff at New Jersey long term care facilities
cleaned_text: The State of NJ site may contain optional links, information, services and/or content from other websites operated by third parties that are provided as a convenience, such as Google Translate.
